title: Hoaxism is still going strong
description: Despite - or maybe because - the ongoing pandemic hoaxists are still sticking to their believes. It's also one thing Britain might be world beating.

title: The evolution of co-delusion
description: How is anti vaccination sentiment related to covid hoaxism?

title: Welcome to Memonomics Lab
description: We are a group of Imperial College and LSE researchers using social media data to answer questions relevant to economics and current affairs.
